title: Clinical significance of ECG characteristics from single-lead ECG patch on atrial fibrillation recurrences after pulmonary vein isolation
details: B Krzowski, ECZ Czinn, XX Xia, SMC Mnnitt, BH Hall… - Europace, 2025
abstract: Background Pulmonary vein isolation (PVI) is a well-established treatment for symptomatic atrial fibrillation (AF), demonstrating high efficacy and safety. However, early depolarization variabilities are observed after PVI due to acute inflammation …
